head.title: Burnett USA Names New Chief Executive

hedline.hl1: Burnett USA Names New Chief Executive

abstract.p: Leo Burnett USA names Brad W Brinegar chief executive, succeeding Linda Wolf, who is set to become parent Leo Burnett Worldwide chairwoman and chief executive (S)

block.p: Brad W. Brinegar, chief operating officer at Leo Burnett USA in Chicago, part of Leo Burnett Worldwide, has been named chief executive, effective on Jan. 1. Mr. Brinegar, 45, will succeed Linda Wolf, 52, who was named last week as the next chairwoman and chief executive of Burnett Worldwide, also effective on Jan. 1.
Mr. Brinegar has been chief operating officer since July, when he rejoined the agency after serving as president of the Chicago office of Lowe Lintas & Partners Worldwide, which closed.

Brad W. Brinegar, chief operating officer at Leo Burnett USA in Chicago, part of Leo Burnett Worldwide, has been named chief executive, effective on Jan. 1. Mr. Brinegar, 45, will succeed Linda Wolf, 52, who was named last week as the next chairwoman and chief executive of Burnett Worldwide, also effective on Jan. 1.
Mr. Brinegar has been chief operating officer since July, when he rejoined the agency after serving as president of the Chicago office of Lowe Lintas & Partners Worldwide, which closed.
Lowe is part of the Lowe Group unit of the Interpublic Group of Companies and Burnett Worldwide is part of the B Com3 Group.
